entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as setting off after Crookshanks.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: A cat that Harry is following through a tunnel. Mentioned as having its tail bobbing in and out of view.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A character who is following Harry through the tunnel, asking questions about where they are going.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Two characters mentioned as having said that no one has ever gotten into the tunnel before. They are also associated with the Marauder's Map.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: A magical map that shows the location of people and objects in the school, mentioned as showing the tunnel but not its exit point.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: A village near Hogwarts, mentioned as a possible destination for the tunnel.

entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: A shop in Hogwarts, mentioned as being similar in length to the current tunnel.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as being in danger from an enormous dog.

relationships.description: Harry is following Crookshanks through the tunnel, as mentioned in the text: 'He and Hermione paused, gasping for breath, edging forward. Both raised their wands to see what lay beyond.'
Harry and Hermione are following each other through the tunnel, as mentioned in the text: 'He and Hermione paused, gasping for breath, edging forward.'
Harry is concerned about Ron's safety, as mentioned in the text: 'All Harry could think of was Ron and what the enormous dog might be doing to him.'
